resources.string: Heatmap shows you the number of habits performed each day. Darker days mean more completed habits on a given day. Tap on a day to see the actual number.
Once you create habits and perform them, this calendar will show how successful each day was.

Your most often performed habits. Shows the number of times you completed your habits. The strength bar shows the ratio of completed and missed days since the first day (the bar is full if you have a perfect streak without a missed day).
Create more habits and perform them at least once to see your success rate here.
Your most successful days. The list shows the day when each habit is performed most often and the number of completed habits on the day.
A bit more data is needed to display your top days. Add more habits and perform them a few times.
